job_tasks.phrase: be at the forefront of innovation.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on developing new solutions and being involved in the creation of new features or products, which aligns with the general scope of software development.
This directly relates to the creation and development of new concepts and solutions, a core aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions integration of developed solutions into existing products, a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and developing the backend infrastructure that enables our enterprise customers to safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of building backend systems to support the integration of AI solutions, fitting the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: creating a robust and scalable AI engine that ensures seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a core system component (AI engine) with a focus on non-functional requirements like scalability, reliability, and efficiency, which are hallmarks of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure: Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
job_tasks.justification: This bullet point is a comprehensive description of traditional software development lifecycle tasks applied to an AI backend.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems: Integrate AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring seamless data exchange, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly involves integrating AI models into existing systems, a core software integration responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement Data Security and Governance: Implement robust data security measures, including encryption, access controls, and auditing, to ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data.
job_tasks.justification: While data security can be a specialized area, implementing these measures within an infrastructure context is a software engineering task focused on system integrity and protection.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates interaction and working with external parties to assess solutions, which falls under collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with various internal teams to achieve a common goal, fitting the definition of Communication & Collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Our mission is to help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the overarching business goal and how AI is intended to solve client problems, indicating an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: This position is perfect for someone passionate about AI, eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation.
job_tasks.justification: While aspirational, 'eager to make an impact' suggests a focus on delivering value and contributing to business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates interaction and working with external parties to assess solutions, which falls under collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with various internal teams to achieve a common goal, fitting the definition of Communication & Collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as designing, developing, testing, and maintaining backend infrastructure, integrating solutions into enterprise systems, and implementing data security. While AI is mentioned as the domain, the core responsibilities described fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it involves building software that integrates AI solutions.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed in its description of responsibilities, focusing heavily on software engineering aspects related to AI integration. The tasks are well-defined and align directly with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, making the classification unambiguous.
